text: Enemy of the State is a 1998 action film directed by Tony Scott and starring Will Smith, Gene Hackman, Jon Voight and Gabriel Byrne. Released on November 20, 1998, it received positive reviews and was a box office success. ==References== ==Other websites== * * * * * Category:1998 action movies Category:1998 thriller movies Category:1990s action thriller movies Category:American action thriller movies Category:Movies about computing Category:Movies about security and surveillance Category:Movies set in Baltimore Category:Movies set in Washington, D.C. Category:Movies directed by Tony Scott
title: Enemy of the State
